name: Colorful Mastodon
description:
Colorful headers for Mastodon. 
Mastodon.social is supported out of the box, add your domain to the script (where it says "addyourdomain.here").
CREDITS go to aleph.land for the idea / initial color scheme
additional_info:
VERSIONS
2018-08-29:
- replaced "plum" with a darker color
2018-08-28:
- fixed grey 'getting started' button
2018-01-24:
- updated for Mastodon 2.2
- color sequence is now fixed and not depending on column title anymore
- should now work in other languages, too
2017-11-14:
- assigned colors for Favs / Local / Federated timeline (for pinning)
2017-09-15:
- fixed for Mastodon 1.6 (EN only)
- removed width handling (there are better styles for that)
- removed other instances default support
2017-04-28:
- fixed for new Mastodon release
Features in V1:
- adapt column width to screen size (inspired by 'Mastodon Variable Width')
- bright colors for column headers (inspired by Mastodon instance aleph.land)
